text: Alexander Bade (born 25 August 1970) is a German former professional footballer who played as a goalkeeper. Since his retirement from playing, he works as a goalkeeper coach. ==Honours== Borussia Dortmund * DFB-Pokal runner- up: 2007â€“08 ==References== Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Berlin Category:German association football goalkeepers Category:Arminia Bielefeld players
title: Alexander Bade
